metadata.title: CVE-2024-2193 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A Speculative Race Condition (SRC) vulnerability that impacts modern CPUarchitectures supporting speculative execution (related to Spectre V1) hasbeen disclosed. An unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerabilityto disclose arbitrary data from the CPU using race conditions to access thespeculative executable code paths.

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe-5.19: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-hwe-6.2').
